name: Faerie Solitaire Harvest Free
description:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/348910/Faerie_Solitaire_Harvest/

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.subsoap.fsh

https://www.amazon.com/dp/B07WHNBDRV

Match cards and rescue Faeries as you explore the many and vast enchanted worlds of Faerie Solitaire Harvest!

This is the FREE version of Faerie Solitaire Harvest. The full version contains more features, including pets to collect and evolve, valor and talents to unlock, and many more worlds to explore. Progress from the FREE version does not carry over to the full version so upgrade as soon as you decide you want the best experience!

Faerie Solitaire Harvest is a match-2 solitaire card game. This means you match two cards of the same value to clear them from the board. King with a King, Ace with an Ace, and so on. Don't let the apparent simplicity fool you, there is still depth, strategy, and luck involved in this game. Faerie Solitaire Harvest is designed to be fun no matter how you choose to play it.
